params.name: pan_and_scan_min_crop_size
params.description: Minimum size of each crop in pan and scan.

params.name: pan_and_scan_max_num_crops
params.description: Maximum number of crops per image in pan and scan.

params.name: pan_and_scan_min_ratio_to_activate
params.description: Minimum aspect ratio to activate pan and scan.

params.name: data_format
params.description: The channel dimension format of the image. If not provided, it will be the same as the input image.

params.name: input_data_format
params.description: The channel dimension format of the input image. If not provided, it will be inferred.
